releases.summary: Initial release of Core Pro with advanced DevOps foundations beyond the free tier, covering CI/CD, governance, security, reliability, and production decision-making.
highlights: Security and governance in DevOps workflows

releases.summary: Introduced the Observability domain with hands-on labs focused on metrics, logs, alerting, incident command, and decision-making under partial visibility.
highlights: Multi-signal correlation and root cause analysis

releases.summary: Released the AIOps domain focusing on AI-assisted operations, agent reliability, governance, and human-in-the-loop operational decisions.
Launched CloudOps (AWS) domain covering real-world AWS architecture failures, resilience design, IAM issues, and operational decision-making.
highlights: AWS reliability and blast radius containment

releases.summary: Launched CloudOps (Azure) domain focusing on Azure infrastructure failures, identity design, networking, and operational trade-offs.
Launched CloudOps (GCP) domain covering Google Cloud architecture failures, reliability design, IAM models, and production operations.
highlights: Reliability and cost trade-off decisions in GCP
